DOC.brief_summary: The goal intervention study implement best practice strategy expand promote school breakfast program test impact upon student participation rate among ) 10th 11th grade student among randomly select cohort 800 student b ) total diet body mass index percent body fat inin 16 rural Minnesota school district . School-wide Primary Aim : Improve participation school breakfast program among high school student . Hypothesis : School-wide school breakfast program participation high intervention versus comparison group .
DOC.detailed_description: We accomplish follow secondary aim use random subsample 800 incoming 10th and11th grade student . Student-level Secondary Aims Secondary Aim 1 : High school student intervention condition decrease rate weight gain relative height gain measure change body mass index percent body fat compare student control condition . Hypothesis : Body mass index percent body fat maintain reduce treatment versus control group . Secondary Aim 2 : High school student intervention condition maintain decrease energy intake improve dietary intake low fat dairy , whole grain fresh fruit compare control student . Hypothesis : Energy intake ( measure 3 , 24-hour recall ) maintain reduced intake low fat dairy , whole grain fresh fruit increase intervention group . Secondary Aim 3 : Compared student control condition , high school student intervention condition report receive support eat school breakfast . Support social ( increased peer school support ) relate school environment ( satisfaction serve location time , eat location , food increase availability low fat dairy , fruit whole grain breakfast ) . Hypothesis : The treatment group report receive social school environment support eat school breakfast comparison group ( measure student survey ) .
DOC.criteria: Must 10th 11th grade school year 201314 Must access internet Must access phone Exclusion Criteria Cohort : Unable read English Unable speak English Pregnant Plan move school district within school year Not school morning Eat breakfast 4 day week
